detaileddescription.para: Coefficients of a piece-wise function. The pieces of the function span the value ranges between two adjacent pivot values.

simplesect.para: sizeof(AVDOVIRpuDataHeader) is not part of the public ABI.

detaileddescription.para: Coefficients of the non-linear inverse quantization. For the interpretation of these, see ETSI GS CCM 001.
Dolby Vision RPU data mapping parameters.

simplesect.para: sizeof(AVDOVIDataMapping) is not part of the public ABI.

detaileddescription.para: Dolby Vision RPU colorspace metadata parameters.

simplesect.para: sizeof(AVDOVIColorMetadata) is not part of the public ABI.

detaileddescription.para: Dolby Vision metadata extension block. Dynamic extension blocks may change from frame to frame, while static blocks are constant throughout the entire sequence.

simplesect.para: sizeof(AVDOVIDmData) is not part of the public API.

detaileddescription.para: Combined struct representing a combination of header, mapping and color metadata, for attaching to frames as side data.

simplesect.para: The struct must be allocated with av_dovi_metadata_alloc() and its size is not a part of the public ABI.

detaileddescription.para: Allocate a AVDOVIDecoderConfigurationRecord structure and initialize its fields to default values.

simplesect.para: the newly allocated struct or NULL on failure

detaileddescription.para: Find an extension block with a given level, or NULL. In the case of multiple extension blocks, only the first is returned.
Allocate an AVDOVIMetadata structure and initialize its fields to default values.

parameterdescription.para: If this parameter is non-NULL, the size in bytes of the allocated struct will be written here on success

simplesect.para: the newly allocated struct or NULL on failure
